name: Demilich
lore: A demilich is what remains when a lich loses the will or ability to maintain its phylactery. Over time, the lich's body crumbles to dust, leaving only a skull—or sometimes a single tooth or finger bone—set with soul gems that still flicker with trapped essences. Despite this diminished form, a demilich retains formidable magical power and can unleash devastating waves of necrotic energy, drain the life from nearby creatures, and terrify the stoutest of heroes.
resistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Avoidance
traits.description: If the demilich is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Turn Immunity
traits.description: The demilich is immune to effects that turn Undead.

multiattack.description: The demilich makes three Necrotic Enervation attacks.

actions.name: Necrotic Enervation
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +11, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Howl
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 19, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the demilich. Failure: 54 (12d8) Necrotic damage. Success: Half damage only.

savingThrow.targets: each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the demilich

actions.name: Flight
actions.description: The demilich flies up to half its Fly Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

actions.name: Necrotic Enervation
actions.description: The demilich makes one Necrotic Enervation attack.

actions.name: Frightening Gaze
actions.description: The demilich targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 19. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition until the end of its next turn.

savingThrow.targets: one creature the demilich can see within 60 feet

conditions.duration: until the end of its next turn
